name: Hula Wii: Hula de Hajimeru - Bi to Kenkou!
summary: In Hula Wii: Hula de Hajimeru - Bi to Kenkou! by utilizing the Wii Balance Board, players can take Hula lessons right in front of the television and learn how to shake, gesticulate, and dance like a native Hawaiian. In addition to the tutorials, the software also includes footage of dancers doing the Hula in the classic style. A video travelogue developed with the participation of the Hawaii Tourism Authority is also included on the Wii DVD which shows off the sights and natural beauty of Hawaii.
